description.narrative: Strengthen the capacities of the Takaful & Karama (Solidarity and Dignity) conditional and unconditional cash transfer Programme

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: - Curriculum for outreach workers - 200 supervisors raedat sensitized to gender and social protection isssues. - 85 % of trained supervisors succeed in post test. - Training Plan for step down training for remaining raedats at governorate level. - 75% of step down training completed. - 70% of trained raedats complete post test successfully at governorate level. - Number of youth participants in each Forum. - Number of initiatives and activities implemented by the Youth via T&K NGOs. - Guidelines for relevant departments approved. - Number of Trainees in each department. - Monitoring Plan by departments for following up on outreach workers. - Number of Trainees in each Gov. - Indicators of issues above incorporated in T&K NGOs plans. - Policy paper on FGM Abandonment highlighting most important lessons learned and the way forward launched. - National Policy adopted and consolidated among stakeholders. - Task Force established with key legal partners. - Legal implementation framework for FGM, child marriage and trafficking developed. - National Policy Paper developed on social and gender inclusion. - Policy paper disseminated and adopted by relevant T&K national partners. - No. of national partners mainstreaming national policy recommendations on gender and social inclusion. - Social media dialogue enhanced on gender and social inclusion. - No. of media messages on gender and social inclusion. - Messages developed and approved. - Messages and design for materials pre-tested. - Materials printed and disseminated. - Draft National Framework developed. - Draft shared with relevant stakeholders. - Framework launched to all national and international stakeholders. - Framework adopted by concerned partners. - Draft Resource plan for integrating gender and social protection issues in T&K approved by MOSS. - Resources mobilized for next phase of T&K to enhance conditionality of program. - TORs developed, approved and announced. - Finance Coordinator selected and contract

comment.narrative: - Takaful and Karama Programme Database - NGOs affiliated with Takaful and Karama Programme - National FGM Abandonment Strategy 2016-2020 - EDHS 2014

- Launch and publication of Waai curriculum which is a comprehensive social protection awareness and advocacy programme that focuses on enhancing awareness and knowledge of vulnerable groups on social protection services - Production of short film (infograph) illustrating Waais comprehensive social protection awareness and advocacy programme that focuses on enhancing awareness and knowledge of vulnerable groups on social protection services - Design of Waais material and manual for social workers and rural leaders

- Launch of Waai programme took place in February 2020 with the attendance of nearly 250 attendees, encompassing the different stakeholders of Waai, including representatives from the different NGOs, directorates, partnering ministries, in addition to media personnel, public figures, donors and the ministrys social workers. - Publication of Waai; 600 packages of 12 booklets - Rolling out of a short film (infograph) on Waai - Waai material and manuals for social workers and rural leaders rolled out.

-Develop comprehensive Q & As based on most frequented family concerns from the T&K program for the outreach workers on child marriage and trafficking, FGM and social and gender exclusion. - 6 TOT programs for 150 supervisor raedats involved in T&K on the issues above mentioned for mainstreaming in the advocacy messages of T&K Program. - Develop unified guidelines for the relevant departments at MOSS (example: Women department) to follow up on the effectiveness of mainstreaming above mentioned issues in T&K. - Develop and produce simplified messages on above mentioned issues for T&K beneficiaries to enhance their adoption of national policy and vision on issues related to gender, population and family empowerment.

-585 raedat refiyat (women rural leaders) and 200 beneficiaries (80% women) received training under Takaful and Karama programme in 11 governorates. -The 585 raedat refiyat (women rural leaders) —20 women rural leaders were consulted on the messages prior to training— and 200 beneficiaries —for pre-testing— received training on the Wa’ay awareness raising and advocacy programme that aims to achieve social behaviour change and develop 11 advocacy messages among the poorest of the poor beneficiaries of Takaful and Karama programme to promote social behaviour change. -The 11 advocacy messages include 3 of which that are part of the conditionality provision of Takaful and Karama; Safe motherhood, child Health and Combatting illiteracy, while the other 8 include: child marriage, female genital abandonment, citizenship and community participation, early detection, substance abuse, economic empowerment, family planning and community health and environment.
